title: New York Style Sausage Co. Recalls Pork Products Due To Misbranding
summary: Editors note: This recall was updated on Jan. 14, 2016 to correct packaging details.WASHINGTON, Jan. 8, 2016 New York Style Sausage Co., a Sunnyvale, Calif. establishment, is recalling approximately 4,040 pounds of pork sausage products due to misbranding, the U.S. Department of Agricultures Food Safety...
